steps: Cook Chhole: Pressure cook soaked chickpeas. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and tomatoes with spices. Add cooked chickpeas and simmer. Garnish with coriander.
Prepare Bhature Dough: Mix maida, sooji, curd, baking soda, and salt. Knead into a soft dough. Rest for 2 hours.
Fry Bhature: Roll dough into discs and deep fry until puffed.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for 1 hour.
Cook chicken in butter until golden brown.
Prepare gravy with butter, tomato puree, cream, and spices. Add cooked chicken and simmer.
Fry paneer lightly and set aside.
Prepare gravy with butter, tomato puree, and spices. Add cream and paneer.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve hot.
Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Sauté onions and add mutton. Cook until tender.
Simmer with water and spices to form a rich gravy.
Sauté whole spices and vegetables.
Add soaked rice and water. Cook until rice is fluffy.
Garnish with fried onions and serve.
Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook rice until half done. Layer chicken and rice in a pot.
Seal and cook on low heat until fully done.
Prepare dough with wheat flour and water.
Stuff dough with spiced mashed potatoes. Roll into parathas.
Cook on a tawa with ghee until golden brown.
Marinate fish with turmeric and salt. Fry lightly.
Prepare curry with coconut milk and spices. Add fish and simmer.
Serve hot with rice.
Cook dal in a pressure cooker.
Prepare tadka with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Add to dal.
Garnish with coriander and serve.
Boil eggs and set aside.
Prepare gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Add eggs and simmer for 10 minutes.
Make a paste of soaked cashews and blend with cream.
Cook paneer in a rich gravy made from cashew paste and spices.
Simmer and garnish with coriander.
Marinate chicken with yogurt and tandoori masala for 4 hours.
Grill or bake until cooked and charred.
Serve with lemon and onion rings.
Stir-fry vegetables in oil.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce. Mix well.
Serve hot with chili sauce.
Marinate prawns with turmeric and salt.
Prepare curry with coconut milk and spices. Add prawns.
Simmer until prawns are cooked.
Cook rajma in a pressure cooker.
Prepare a masala base with onions and tomatoes.
Add cooked rajma and simmer. Serve with rice.
Cook mutton mince with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Simmer until keema is fully cooked and flavors develop.
Garnish with coriander.
Prepare veggie balls with grated cabbage, carrot, and cornflour.
Deep fry balls and set aside.
Prepare sauce with soy sauce and spices. Toss balls in sauce.
Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala.
Skewer and grill until fully cooked.
Serve with mint chutney.
Prepare dosa using fermented batter.
Stuff dosa with spiced potato filling.
Serve with chutney and sambar.
Marinate fish with spices and coat in rice flour.
Shallow fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with lemon wedges.
